verses.name: 1 Samuel 22:10
verses.text: And he enquired of the Lord for him, and gave him victuals, and gave him the sword of Goliath the Philistine.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 22:11
verses.text: Then the king sent to call Ahimelech the priest, the son of Ahitub, and all his father’s house, the priests that were in Nob: and they came all of them to the king.

verses.name: 1 Samuel 22:12
verses.text: And Saul said, Hear now, thou son of Ahitub. And he answered, Here I am, my lord.
